description:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw() (shared/access_control/FibonacciBalance/FibonacciBalance_3round.sol#19-25) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(calculatedFibNumber * 1000000000000000000) (shared/access_control/FibonacciBalance/FibonacciBalance_3round.sol#24)

FibonacciBalance.withdraw() (shared/access_control/FibonacciBalance/FibonacciBalance_3round.sol#19-25) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	- require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter)) (shared/access_control/FibonacciBalance/FibonacciBalance_3round.sol#22)

FibonacciBalance.fallback() (shared/access_control/FibonacciBalance/FibonacciBalance_3round.sol#27-29) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	- require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data)) (shared/access_control/FibonacciBalance/FibonacciBalance_3round.sol#28)

FibonacciBalance.calculatedFibNumber (shared/access_control/FibonacciBalance/FibonacciBalance_3round.sol#7) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- FibonacciBalance.withdraw() (shared/access_control/FibonacciBalance/FibonacciBalance_3round.sol#19-25)
